content:
Before construction begins, the owner's consulting engineer shall prepare and distribute
minutes of the preconstruction conference. Conference participants may file exceptions
to the minutes. The engineer shall distribute copies of exceptions to the conference
participants and shall include the exceptions in the inspection file.

Source: City Code Section 25-1-285; Ord. 031211-11; Ord. 031211-42.

The single office shall deliver copies of the released subdivision construction plans
and approved plan revisions to the appropriate staff for inspection.

Source: City Code Section 25-1-311; Ord. 031211-11; Ord. 031211-42.
